item.title: 华尔街科技股走强，亚洲股市有望上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在全球最大的几家科技公司反弹提振美国基准指数之后，亚洲股市将继续走高。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to edge higher after a rally in some of the world’s largest technology companies lifted US benchmarks.】

item.title: 墨西哥以涉嫌倾销为由对越南钢丝征收 36% 的关税
item.description: 墨西哥将对从越南进口的焊接用钢丝征收 36.23% 的关税，称这损害了拉丁美洲第二大经济体的本地生产商。【原文：Mexico will impose a 36.23% tariff on imports of steel wire used for welding from Vietnam, saying they are harming local producers in Latin America’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 名人支持的美甲沙龙 Glosslab 申请破产
item.description: Glosslab LLC 是一家总部位于纽约的美甲连锁店，曾尝试过会员制商业模式，并吸引了不少名人投资者，现已申请破产。【原文：Glosslab LLC, a New York City-based nail salon chain that experimented with a membership-based business model and attracted celebrity investors, has filed bankruptcy.】

item.title: 法国政府希望 2025 年赤字率保持在国内生产总值的 5%左右或更高一点
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁说，他的目标是与议会就2025年预算达成协议，将国家赤字降至接近5%的水平，接近他的前任曾试图达到但未果的水平。【原文：French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou said he aimed to reach an agreement with parliament on a 2025 budget that would reduce the country’s deficit to close to 5%, near the level that his predecessor unsuccessfully tried to reach.】

item.title: 雷亚尔贬值，巴西央行提议抛售 30 亿美元
item.description: 在人们对巴西债务可持续性的担忧引发雷亚尔飙升之际，巴西央行再次入市支撑雷亚尔。【原文：Brazil’s central bank stepped into markets again to prop up the real amid a rout sparked by concerns about the sustainability of the country’s debt.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将关键利率上调至 8.75%，警示通胀前景面临风险
item.description: 乌拉圭央行周一以基本通胀和长期通胀预期上升为由，将利率上调四分之一个点，令市场感到意外。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank surprised markets with a quarter-point interest rate hike Monday, citing an uptick in underlying inflation and long-term inflation expectations.】

item.title: 新加坡在争夺加密货币中心的竞争中领先于香港
item.description: 新加坡正努力在 2024 年建立一个数字资产中心，而竞争对手香港的金融中心却一直在苦苦挣扎。【原文：Singapore forged ahead with efforts to formulate a digital-assets hub in 2024, while rival financial center Hong Kong has struggled to gain traction.】

item.title: 美联储就银行压力测试改革征求公众意见
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（美联储）周一表示，美国联邦储备委员会将对其年度银行健康检查方式进行一系列改革，华尔街银行将有新的机会参与其中。【原文：Wall Street banks will have a fresh opportunity to weigh in on a raft of changes to how the US Federal Reserve conducts its annual bank-health check up, the central bank said on Monday.】

item.title: 韩国消费者信心指数创大流行病以来最大跌幅
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈宣布戒严并遭到弹劾，引发了政治动荡，韩国消费者信心受此打击，创下自本月科维德事件爆发以来的最大跌幅。【原文：South Korea’s consumer confidence dropped by the most since the outbreak of Covid-19 this month, battered by the political turmoil triggered by President Yoon Suk Yeol’s declaration of martial law and his impeachment.】

item.title: 尼日利亚总统蒂努布为经济改革辩护：经济困难是罪魁祸首
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布为他自 2023 年 5 月掌权以来实施的全面经济改革辩护，认为这是防止国家危机所必需的。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu defended sweeping economic reforms implemented since he took power in May 2023 as necessary to prevent a national crisis.】

item.title: 特朗普为五角大楼选中亿万富翁范伯格为黑格塞斯打气
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）选择亿万富翁、金融家斯蒂芬-费恩伯格（Stephen Feinberg）担任五角大楼二号官员，是当选总统为支持其国防部长人选皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）而采取的举措之一，他的副手们将重点引进商业经验和新技术。【原文：Donald Trump’s choice of billionaire financier Stephen Feinberg as the No. 2 official at the Pentagon is part of a move by the president-elect to back up Pete Hegseth, his choice for defense secretary, with deputies focused on bringing in business experience and new technology.】

item.title: ASML 向工人出售最先进芯片设备的 "乐高 "模型
item.description: ASML Holding NV 是世界上最先进芯片制造设备的荷兰制造商，它向员工出售其最珍贵产品的 "乐高 "复制品。【原文：ASML Holding NV, the Dutch maker of the world’s most advanced chipmaking machines, was selling ‘Lego’ replicas of its most prized product to employees.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称澳大利亚风险向下倾斜，敦促保持克制
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，澳大利亚的风险平衡倾向于下行，包括潜在的通货紧缩停滞，并呼吁政府避免过度支出。【原文：Australia’s balance of risks is tilted to the downside, including a potential stall in disinflation, the International Monetary Fund said, calling on the government to avoid excessive spending.】

item.title: 玛丽-戴利谈美联储减息、2025 年展望和人工智能
item.description:
在通胀仍高于目标的情况下，为何要削减通胀？【原文：

Why cut when inflation is still above target?

】

item.title: 纳斯达克 100 指数再平衡，特斯拉、Meta 和 Broadcom 权重下降
item.description: 在 2024 年科技股大涨使纳斯达克 100 指数达到前所未有的规模之后，全球最大的三家公司在纳斯达克 100 指数中的影响力有所下降。【原文：Three of the world’s biggest companies have had their influence reduced in the Nasdaq 100 Index after the giant technology rally of 2024 swelled them to unprecedented size.】

item.title: 美国国债收益率走高，长期债务不受青睐
item.description: 由于交易商继续认为美联储明年的降息步伐将放缓，以及当选总统唐纳德-特朗普执政后国家财政背景可能恶化，国债收益率周一上涨。【原文：Treasury yields rose on Monday as traders continue to see a slower pace of interest rate reductions by the Federal Reserve next year and the potential worsening of country’s fiscal backdrop under President-elect Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 加拿大央行官员认为第二次巨额降息 "千钧一发
item.description: 加拿大央行官员承认，他们连续第二次降息半个百分点的决定是一个 "千钧一发的决定"，一些决策者最初倾向于降低较小的借贷成本。【原文：Bank of Canada officials acknowledged their decision to cut interest rates by half a percentage point for a second consecutive meeting was a “close call,” with some policymakers initially tilting toward a smaller reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 纽约联储对关键回购机制的调整因其设计而受阻
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行计划在年底前开展额外的流动性操作，这将在资金市场趋于波动的时候提供所需的支持，尽管其当前的框架将限制这些措施的有效性。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s plan to conduct additional liquidity operations through the end of the year will provide needed support at a time when funding markets tend to be volatile, though its current framework will limit the effectiveness of the measures.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会称 AT&T 可以用无线家庭电话代替铜缆电话
item.description: 联邦通信委员会提前送给 AT&T 公司一份圣诞礼物：允许该公司用新的无线座机技术取代旧的铜质家庭电话线。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission gave AT&T Inc. an early Christmas present: permission to replace old copper home-phone lines with a new wireless landline technology.】

item.title: 特朗普执政后，"兼并与破产世界 "看到了底层贸易复苏的曙光
item.description: 兼并套利投资者急于翻过 2024 年这一页，他们押注当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府将在充满交易延迟和失败的一年后重振这一饱受打击的策略。【原文：Merger-arbitrage investors are eager to turn the page on 2024, as they bet that the incoming administration of President-elect Donald Trump will revive the battered strategy after a year filled with deal delays and busts.】

item.title: 约翰-米勒的新型高收益债券基金将在 2024 年主导市场
item.description: 今年是高收益市政债券的丰收年，尤其是该类别的明星基金经理约翰-米勒（John Miller），他在纽文公司（Nuveen）工作了近三十年后，于今年 1 月加入了 First Eagle Investments。【原文：It’s been a banner year for high-yield municipal bonds, and in particular the category’s star money manager, John Miller, who joined First Eagle Investments in January after nearly three decades at Nuveen.】

item.title: 特朗普在运河控制权问题上的争执拖累巴拿马资产
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普与巴拿马之间就世界上最重要的水道之一发生的争执正在损害该国的资产。【原文：A row developing between President-elect Donald Trump and Panama over one of the world’s most-important waterways is denting the nation’s assets.】

item.title: 希腊与以色列签署地区能源稳定协议
item.description: 希腊和以色列周一签署了一项促进地区能源稳定和东地中海项目的协议。【原文：Greece and Israel signed Monday an agreement to promote regional energy stability and projects in the Eastern Mediterranean.】

item.title: 华尔街支持美联储，认为 2025 年美国债券收益率将下降
item.description: 尽管当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易和税收政策对债券市场的威胁迫在眉睫，但华尔街仍从美联储那里得到启示，预测 2025 年美国短期国债收益率将下降。【原文：Wall Street is taking its cues from the Federal Reserve, forecasting short-term US Treasury yields to fall in 2025 despite the looming threat of President-elect Donald Trump’s trade and tax policies on the bond market.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心下降，政治因素影响前景
item.description: 由于特朗普政府政策的不确定性导致人们对经济前景感到担忧，12 月份美国消费者信心指数出人意料地出现了三个月来的首次下滑。【原文：US consumer confidence unexpectedly sank in December for the first time in three months on concerns about the outlook for the economy amid uncertainty around the Trump administration’s policies.】

item.title: 美国 11 月新房销售在经历风暴袭击后出现反弹
item.description: 由于建筑商和消费者完成了因南方暴风雨而推迟的交易，而且购房者利用了大量的销售奖励措施，上个月美国的新房销售出现反弹。【原文：New-home sales in the US rebounded last month as builders and consumers sealed deals that had been delayed by storms in the South, and buyers took advantage of heavy sales incentives.】

item.title: 智利 WOM 公司获准退出破产保护程序
item.description: 智利 WOM 公司在申请破产保护八个月后，同意了债权人集团的收购和重组要约，从而赢得了法院批准，退出破产程序。【原文：Chile’s WOM won court approval to exit bankruptcy proceedings after it agreed to a takeover and restructuring bid from a group of creditors, eight months after filing for Chapter 11.】

item.title: 大和首席执行官称，大和在中国的合资企业可能需要更长时间才能盈利
item.description: 日本第二大券商大和证券集团（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. may need more time to achieve profit in China, according to the head of Japan’s second biggest brokerage, reflecting how investment banks continue to struggle on the mainland.】

item.title: 明年美联储政策的投票者正在发生变化。了解详情
item.description: 美联储利率制定委员会将有新的投票人轮值，而通胀忧虑的重燃又为央行的决策注入了新的复杂性。【原文：New voters are set to rotate onto the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate-setting committee just as renewed inflation concerns inject a fresh layer of complexity into the central bank’s decision making.】

item.title: PAG 通过技术服务交易从 Nash Squared 收购英国外包公司
item.description: 亚洲最大的另类资产管理公司之一 PAG 已从 Nash Squared 收购了总部位于伦敦的信息技术服务外包公司 NashTech。【原文：PAG, one of Asia’s biggest alternative asset managers, has bought London-based information technology services outsourcing company NashTech from Nash Squared.】
